summary:
This mod will add a UNIQUE Mage Staff that uses the Unrelenting Force shout as a new enchantment.

To find it just go inside the Arch Mage's Quarters in Winterhold

It will work just as the Fus ro dah (all the words of power)
descriptionHtml:
***LOTR Saruman Staff***

This mod will add a UNIQUE Mage Staff that uses the Unrelenting Force shout as a new enchantment.

To find it just go inside the Arch Mage's Quarters in Winterhold

It will work just as the Fus ro dah (all the words of power)


Install:
Put all the files on your Skyrim/Data folder
author: Quechus9
